title: "CJKV Information Processing" 2E
content:
I finished "CJKV Information Processing" Second Edition in mid-December, and received the first two copies yesterday (Christmas Eve, 2008). Attached is a photo of one of them. See: [http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596514471/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110450/http:/oreilly.com/catalog/9780596514471/)

[http://typophile.com/files/cjkvip2e-12242008-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110450/http:/typophile.com/files/cjkvip2e-12242008-1.jpg)
author: lunde
